metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19662 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is a buffer over-read in the function i2alaw_array in alaw.c that will lead to a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2+esm1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2+esm1').
